name: @atendesimples/call-tracking
description: A simple and lightweight library to use call tracking feature by Atende Simples
author: Thadeu Esteves<tadeuu@gmail.com>

scripts.build:staging: rm -rf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging microbundle src/index.ts
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production microbundle src/index.ts
